name: Geometry Monster (BUT IT'S HARDCORE!!!)
description:
DIDN'T LIKE GEOMETRY MONSTER HUH??? TOO EASY FOR YOU??? WELL BUCKLE UP BUTTERCUP, BECAUSE THIS GAME WILL RIP YOUR SOCKS OFF, FEED THOSE SOCKS TO A PACK OF RABID RAZOR-GEESE, AND THEN SHRED ON AN ELECTRIC GUITAR FOR EFFECT. 

OH, YOU WERE EXPECTING A DESCRIPTION OF THE GAME? TOO BAD!!! GUESS YOU'LL JUST HAVE TO PLAY IT TO FIND OUT!!!

----------------------------------------------------------------

Game made by Seth K.

Outside Assets Used:

Skull GD - Leopoldo456 https://opengameart.org/content/skull-gd

Gold Skull - cron https://opengameart.org/content/gold-skull

Electric Guitar Distorted Slide - mixkit.co https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/instrument/

Guitar - debudding https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/guitar-93245/

Tubular Bell of Death - ani music https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/tubular-bell-of-death-89485/

Thanks so much for playing!!!
